name: rhymez
description: The only rhyming package for node that can rhyme from multiple words and find mutli-word rhymes with assonance!

scripts.test-es5: npm run build && babel test --out-dir test-es5 && sed -i '.bak' 's/\/src\//\/lib\//' test-es5/*.js
scripts.test: npm run build && mocha --ui tdd --timeout 300000 --compilers js:babel-core/register --require test/mocha-babel
